comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/28792
Committed: http://github.com/openstack/nova/commit/175584f0afef308e1021bb4daf49cbf222a61a40

Branch:    master

commit 175584f0afef308e1021bb4daf49cbf222a61a40
Author: Pádraig Brady <email address hidden>
Date:   Fri May 10 13:35:39 2013 +0100

    fix non reporting of failures with floating IP assignment
    
    It seems that commit essex-1-1003-g9728ae5
    inadvertently removed a 'raise', thus hiding
    all processutils.ProcessExecutionError exceptions
    apart from the one indicating "Interface not found".
    
    Fixes bug: 1178658
    Change-Id: I2bcf8c3a19ebebc81a38ce6bf7b54065d62834c0
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

    fix non reporting of failures with floating IP assignment
    
    It seems that commit essex-1-1003-g9728ae5

    apart from the one indicating "Interface not found".
